      Constructor and Description

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToList(FileObject file)
      Adds a CheckListEntry to the list of files used in the GUI.
      private void getDrives()
      Opens a file-choose dialog to choose the drives to add to the tree, then saves them to the list in Engine.
      private File getRoot()
      Gets the drive/root of the folder of the application.
      private void initialize()
      Initialise the contents of the frame.
      void initList()
      Sets the list of files to the files' list in Engine, then refreshes the visual list.
      private void minimiseToTray()
      Minimises the app to the system-tray.
      private void refreshList()
      Repaints the visual list, and sets the general state as out-dated.
      void removeFromList(FileObject file)
      Removes a CheckListEntry from the list of files used in the GUI.
      void resetDivider(int... position)
      Resets the position of the divider between the tree and the files' list.
      private void restoreWindow()
      Restores the app from the system-tray, and brings it to the front.
      private void toggleMonitoring()
      Toggles the state of real-time monitoring between 'enabled' and 'disabled'.
      Also, resets the file-changes counter if the workers are disabled.
      void updateGUIStuff()
      Sets buttons status, and updates the snapshot time.
      private void updateMonitoringButton()
      Sets the button text to reflect the action appropriate for the state of monitoring; 'enable monitoring' if it's disabled, or 'disable monitoring' if it's enabled.
      Also, resets the file-changes counter if the workers are disabled.
      void updateMonitoringUI(String fileString, int counter)
      Adds a log entry for the changed file, and sets the counter's value to the one passed.

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Initialise the contents of the frame.

      • updateGUIStuff

        public void updateGUIStuff()
        Sets buttons status, and updates the snapshot time.

      • minimiseToTray

        private void minimiseToTray()
        Minimises the app to the system-tray.

      • restoreWindow

        private void restoreWindow()
        Restores the app from the system-tray, and brings it to the front.

      • resetDivider

        public void resetDivider(int... position)
        Resets the position of the divider between the tree and the files' list.
        Parameters:
        position - position of the divider.

      • updateMonitoringUI

        public void updateMonitoringUI(String fileString,
                      int counter)
        Adds a log entry for the changed file, and sets the counter's value to the one passed.
        Parameters:
        fileString - File changed.
        counter - Count of files changed so-far.

      • updateMonitoringButton

        private void updateMonitoringButton()
        Sets the button text to reflect the action appropriate for the state of monitoring; 'enable monitoring' if it's disabled, or 'disable monitoring' if it's enabled.
        Also, resets the file-changes counter if the workers are disabled.

      • toggleMonitoring

        private void toggleMonitoring()
        Toggles the state of real-time monitoring between 'enabled' and 'disabled'.
        Also, resets the file-changes counter if the workers are disabled.

      • getDrives

        private void getDrives()
        Opens a file-choose dialog to choose the drives to add to the tree, then saves them to the list in Engine.

      • getRoot

        private File getRoot()
        Gets the drive/root of the folder of the application.
        Returns:
        Drive/root.

      • initList

        public void initList()
        Sets the list of files to the files' list in Engine, then refreshes the visual list.

      • addToList

        public void addToList(FileObject file)
        Adds a CheckListEntry to the list of files used in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        file - FileObject to create a list entry for.

      • removeFromList

        public void removeFromList(FileObject file)
        Removes a CheckListEntry from the list of files used in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        file - FileObject to remove.

      • refreshList

        private void refreshList()
        Repaints the visual list, and sets the general state as out-dated.
